properties.address: Waterlooville Baptist Church, Hampshire PO7 7SY
properties.description: Warm and welcoming cafe, hot drinks and delicious cakes. No set prices, just donate what you can afford, we want no one to feel excluded because of cost. Come to talk, relax, meet new people or come with friends. Open to all, disabled access. Well behaved dogs welcome.
properties.title: 368Community cafe

properties.address: Crookhorn Lane, Widley, Waterlooville PO7 5QB
properties.description: Open from 01:03:2022. A warm hub accessible to all, our Bus Stop Cafe is open for tea/coffee, hot or cold breakfast and cake. Cooked breakfasts are available on Wednesdays then sandwiches or toasted sandwiches and/or cake on Thursdays & Fridays. A hot chocolate and warm space is available on Thursday afternoons. Payment is by donation so pay what you can afford. We offer warmth & a friendly chat. There are five bus routes which stop outside our church: 7, 20, 30, 37 and 39 to Crookhorn Precinct. Parking next door in Perseus Place.
properties.title: Church of the Good Shepherd Crookhorn

properties.address: Chichester Baptist Church, Chichester, West Sussex PO19 3AW
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 15th September 2025** We are launching a community coffee club in September 2025. If you are in the over 65 age rang and maybe living on your own, these morning could be for your. If you'd love the opportunity to meet other people and make new friends, enjoy delicious hot drinks and wonderful home-made cake in a warm space, we'd be so delighted to welcome you. These mornings will be hosted by Chichester Baptist Church but are very much aimed at anyone in our local community regardless of whether you attend a local church or not or share our Christian faith. The mornings will be totally free and there's no need to book - We look forward to seeing you!
properties.title: Community Coffee Club

properties.address: Growing Places Nursery, Waterlooville, Hampshire PO7 7DB
properties.description: Space open to all on a Saturday morning with the opportunity to use local community pantry or simply use the space for a while. Access to free tea, coffee and cakes or biscuits. Open 10am to midday on Saturday.
properties.title: Community pantry

properties.address: Emsworth Sports & Social Club, Emsworth, Hampshire PO10 7JF
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 8th January 2024** Open 5 days a week. 12 till 4pm Mondays till Fridays A warm space, tea, coffee, & cake. A place to socialise, make new friends, join in different activities, board games, singing, snooker, arts etc... Open to all ages, come alone, with a friend or carer.
properties.title: Emsworth Community Hub

properties.description: Graylingwell Chapel is available to everybody from Monday to Sunday, 9am-4pm, with a café; a space to meet; a space to share and come together with friends and family. Plus a pre-school play area for young children. A flexible and welcoming community venue in the heart of the development at Graylingwell Park, Chichester!

properties.address: St Mary Our Lady Parish Rooms, Chichester, West Sussex PO20 7RE
properties.description: Mary's Place is a free weekly drop-in warm space held in the Parish Rooms next to the church. Come along for some company, conversation, a little laughter along with tea, coffee and homemade cake. Everyone is welcome
properties.title: Mary's Place

properties.address: One Church, Hampshire PO10 8BN
properties.description: The warm hub is available as part of the One Foundation foodbank and is open 09:30 - 13:00 on Thursday and 09:30 - 12:00 on Fridays. Free Tea, Coffee and cake is available. The warm hub has a children's indoor play area and an outside play park. Free parking is also available. The warm hub has all amenities available as well as a disabled toilet and disabled parking and building access.
properties.title: One Foundation

properties.address: Sage House,, Tangmere, West Sussex PO20 2FP PO20 2FP
properties.description: Sage House is a Community Hub and Cafe providing support for people living with Dementia and their carers, our warm space and cafe is open to anyone in the local community to access, we have a pay it forward scheme and offers on food and drinks including Soup and a Roll for £2, we also have a small foodbank available with essential items. Everyone is welcome !
properties.title: Sage House

properties.address: First Avenue, Southbourne, Nr Chichester, West Sussex PO10 8PH
properties.title: Southbourne Library

properties.address: Springwood Community Centre, Waterlooville, Hampshire PO7 8BJ
properties.description: The community centre is an inclusive space for everyone. There is a warm communal area with seating and tables where people can enjoy hot drinks and snacks from our tuck shop whilst chatting with their friends or meet new people. We have a very popular book exchange for all ages where you can drop off unwanted books and maybe find a new read, also a jigsaw puzzle swap.
properties.title: Springwood Community Centre

properties.address: Wecock Community Association, Waterlooville, Hampshire PO8 9GX
properties.description: We are a very friendly, welcoming community hub With a large communal area, offering many services and activities throughout the week. We are home to the fantastic Aviary Cafe which serves a great range of hot and cold meals and drinks.
properties.title: The Acorn Centre

properties.address: The Pallant Centre, The Pallant, Hampshire
properties.description: Re-opening Mondays from 6th Nov 2023 , 12 to 2pm Open Wednesdays 12 - 2pm A warm hub accessible to all, we welcome you to join us for tea, coffee and soup. Pay if you can, if you can pay more - pay it forward for someone else.
properties.title: The Pallant Centre

properties.address: 8 Shore Road, Chichester, West Sussex PO20 8DZ
properties.description: Join UKHarvest's mission to fight food waste! Pop into our warm community space for a cup of free homemade delicious soup, warm bread and yummy cake, all crafted from rescued ingredients. Everyone is welcome!
properties.title: The Soup Shop
